name: Icehold
description: Frozen walls and slippery paths define this old tundra outpost. Stay sharp—one wrong step, and you're sliding into trouble.

name: Blazewind
description: Scorching winds sweep through a cracked desert wasteland. Limited cover, high heat—perfect for fast, fierce fights.

name: Mossvale
description: A thick, green jungle with hidden paths and ancient stones. Every turn is a surprise. Quiet… until it isnt.

name: Gearhall
description: An abandoned factory full of ticking traps and moving floors. Master the rhythm, or be crushed by the grind.
